name: 吳岳錚
objective:
文化創意產業含蓋甚廣，不僅僅包含了人文、藝術，甚至在族群文化振興、媒體研究、博物館經營與藝術管理、大眾消費、設計等領域都被重視。也因為文化創意是一塊值得投資的領域，更誘引這些族群的工作者紛紛投入與文化創意產業結合的工作。而本課程將全程使用英文來授課，也可藉由閱讀國內外文化創意相關文章，培養學生的英文閱讀、聽、說、與寫作能力，進而培養更多元的國際觀。相關文創設計內容包含：
藍海策略
香港的文化及創意產業
A genius whose dance express synthesis
六本木之丘─巨大蜘蛛Gigantic spider
聖地牙哥─科技藝術城Motion Capture Animation Collaborative
Creative Placemaking: Good Public Art Depends on Good Public Spaces 
The Parthenon marbles are the world's most beautiful art – and that's why we should give them back
Musical shoes and dancing drones: the arts meet technology in Japan
Takashi Murakami takes on critics with provocative Versailles exhibition
The top 10 female nudes in art
Skinheads: a photogenic, extremist corner of British youth culture
Taiwanese sculptors during the Japanese Occupation period
A portrait of the artists as Taiwanese young men and women
A Rukai Wedding
Kaohsiung: Taiwan’s up-and-coming southern art hub
